topic.title: New World future
topic.body:
Hey all!
I just wanted to know how u guys feel about all these new stuff going on in the world, 
were going to decentralize everything, may start a fight poor vs rich and going to create a new world for our children.
How do you wanna build this world? How will we life, how will we interact with each other, do we still have something called the Evil_?
Jus curious if someone have same thoughts or different one, i am interested in every fruitful conversation. 
Cheers
Max
